CustomField.formula: IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Luxembourg", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),12, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Czech Republic", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),13, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Czech Republic", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),15, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Slovakia", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),16, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Slovakia", RecordType.Name = "CCS Opportunity Layout", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),18, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Austria", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),19, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Germany", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),21, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "France", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell Starts", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),5, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Germany", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell Starts", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"Inbound")),23 ,0)))))))))
CustomField.label: NVM CLID2
